name: Dodgey
description:
In this game, you dodge the bullets. That's basically it. My first finished game!

Control the cursor to avoid bullets. Like, most of them. Some of them are friendly tho.
Version 1.0 with 5 difficulties and 5 bullet types! Any disabled buttons are for future updates. Yeah, ????? is currently inaccessible too.

While this game is technically playable on mobile, I don't recommend it; mostly because you can cheat by tapping places to teleport the cursor, but things like bullet spawning can also get a bit weird for some reason.

And yeah, there's a pause menu. Press ESC.

Don't try quitting on the web version, it just freezes lol.

Recreation of one of my old Scratch projects which you can play right here.

So, have fun I guess.

Your browser might say this file is dangerous; it isn't, choose the option to keep it.

Credits:

  • Made with Godot Game Engine. It's cool. Like seriously. Try it.
  • Code: HighFlyer222
  • Art (art?): HighFlyer222
  • Sound: there is no sound
  • Font: Candy Beans by Chequered Ink
